quote: I was living with my mom in a tiny apartment in Chula Vista, near Third and H Street behind the 7-Eleven. It was crazy to be on the phone with Stevie Wonder. I felt like a meteor hit our apartment!

That's why I admired her so much, because of that versatility.

I'm not going to put myself in a box.
